name: Plastic Chair EVEREST/ORTHO (First Quality)
description: Premium quality plastic chair with ergonomic design. Perfect for home, office, or outdoor use. Durable and comfortable seating solution.

name: Plastic Chair with Armrest
description: Comfortable plastic chair with armrests for added support. Lightweight yet sturdy construction suitable for everyday use.

name: Plastic Chair Armless
description: Sleek armless plastic chair design. Easy to stack and store. Ideal for events, gatherings, or space-saving solutions.

name: Short Stool/Bath Stool
description: Versatile short stool perfect for bathroom use. Non-slip surface ensures safety. Compact and easy to clean.

name: Short Stool/Bath Stool Printed
description: Attractive printed bath stool with modern design. Durable plastic construction with decorative patterns. Adds style to your bathroom.

name: Toilet Chair with Commode
description: Medical-grade toilet chair with commode feature. Provides comfort and convenience for elderly or those with mobility issues.

name: Dust Pedal Bin
description: Hygienic pedal-operated dustbin with 12L capacity. Hands-free operation keeps your home clean. Durable lid mechanism.

name: Dust Pedal Bin Printed
description: Stylish printed pedal dustbin with attractive patterns. Combines functionality with aesthetics. Perfect for modern homes.

name: Commode
description: Compact and portable commode solution. Lightweight and easy to clean. Essential bathroom accessory.

name: Drum with Lid
description: Large 50L drum with secure lid. Perfect for water storage, grains, or general household storage needs. Heavy-duty construction.
